p: Fresh leaves of H. arborescens were collected from a site located on latitude 32° 47′ 50.4″ S, 26° 52′ 41.8″ E along Hogsback road in Alice, Eastern Cape, South Africa, and it was authenticated by Prof. Cupido, a taxonomist at University of Fort Hare. The freshly collected leaves were washed, oven dried at 40°C, pulverized, and stored at 4°C until further analysis.
